@brob What I'm seeing seems to be @gatsbyjs config/code rather than anything @Netlify specific. Even the link in the build logs is to Gatsby Docs for troubleshooting One tip (a bit further down the line) is to not use the Netlify post-processing optimisation. Gatsby handles it for you.
